translation: Among the Vrishnis, I am Vaasudeva; among the Pandavas, I am Arjuna; among the sages, I am Vyasa; among the poets, I am Usanas, the poet.
commentary: 10.37 Vrishnis among the Vrishnis? Vasudeva: Vaasudeva? I am (I) am? Pandavanam among the Pandavas? Dhananjaya: Dhananjaya? Muninam among the sages? Even also? I'm I? Vyasa: Vyasa? of poets among poets? Usanas Usanas? Kavih the poet.Commentary Vrishnis are Yadavas or the descendants of Yadu. I am the foremost among them.Usanas is Sukracharya? the preceptor of the demons.
